reasoning: Gastric cardia carcinoma is a specific subtype of gastric cancer located at the gastroesophageal junction. Global incidence approximately 4.2 per 100k from GLOBOCAN 2005 stomach cancer data, representing ~25-30% of gastric cancers.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
